The present research has tested M. piperita EO in association with several antifungal and antibacterial drugs. The effects have been evaluated on ten strains of Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria and seven strains of Candida spp. FICI values for M. piperita EO in combination with antibacterial agents as gentamicin and ampicillin are reported in
